name: International Folk Dance
description: Come learn Folk Dances from around the world. The class will use circles, lines, sets couples, trios - and more! Beginners welcome! Dance helps maintain balance and brain health. Seniors encouraged to participate. Our dance circle is part of the Folk Dance Federation of Northern California.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 For more information contact Ann Colichidas: acolichidas@gmail.com.
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
